text:
We are putting so much time, energy, and money into this, including the cycles through the attorneys. And that seems to have put a halt on all the
things we were trying to wrap up. It has to be worth an hour of our time to be able to put this to bed and put the kids at ease again....
We really can solve this before we even start another week!
Message 932 of 4024
Let me know what you think. I'd like to keep this moving and get it to them before the weekend.
Realistically this does put pressure on you and I, to work out you and I, but I know we can do that.
best
robert
Sent:02/01/2024 at 08:25 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 06:59 AM)
Subject:SAAS email has been sent for your review
Message 933 of 4024
This all sounds good. Let me sleep on it as well. Also, since we are trying to clear your headspace, if something is in your way that you really don't
want to see, let me know and I'll see if it just makes sense to move it over (I just don't know what those things could be really?). I think we also have a
plan for Sonos (thanks) and Peloton.
The thing that would honestly help me the most, is have you look at my place and think about unused accent pieces that work. That was your jam
and I know we have some extra (old hallway painting? ) I need stuff to put out, not hide away. But I don't want "Big & Little together forever" stuff
and hope we can just store for now.
A pretty productive day, Christine. Especially the Teams call where learned to threaten but back off quickly..lol. I hope we maintain now that we
have seen what rock bottom looks like. We both want a path to mental health and normalcy... But uou won't send to Anna Lisa if I point out how
well we get along when we need to, right ?
Have a great night. Thanks again for the teamwork...
Sent:02/01/2024 at 08:37 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 06:58 AM)
Subject:Re: Packages / Items

metadata.section: 2) Because this is the singularly biggest thing causing all of the problems in our lives.
